name: CRAIGSLIST - Pale Turquoise
description: CL user theme. Be sure to install the font. You're welcome.
additional_info:
First, grab the Outage font for free (or name your price - $0 to get it free) here:
http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=outage

Install the font, and you're good to go.

Oh, and set the domain as such: http://*.craigslist.org/*

This stylesheet will work with User CSS or Stylish.
